title: üõçÔ∏è Artisan Economy ‚Äî AI-Powered Marketplace for Indian Artisans
shortDesc: AI-powered marketplace empowering Indian artisans to sell globally
description: A full-stack AI marketplace built out of personal interest to empower Indian artisans to sell handcrafted products worldwide. Integrates AI storytelling, smart pricing, and secure payments to make artisan businesses sustainable and globally competitive.

title: Cysinfo AI
shortDesc: Cybersecurity AI Assistant using LLMs and Generative AI
description: A project utilizing Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI to enhance cybersecurity learning and problem-solving. It enables efficient data analysis and interactive user experiences, helping users explore and understand various cybersecurity topics.

title: DocuSense
description: An AI-powered documentation assistant using RAG with LangChain, LLaMA 2, and Nomic Embed Text. It delivers real-time, context-aware query resolution through a Streamlit interface, optimized with Ollama.

title: Voice Genius
description: A web application that utilizes OpenAI API and SpeechRecognition API to create a voice-accessible chat interface powered by GPT-3.5 turbo model for natural voice interactions.

title: Beyond Skin-Deep
description: A comprehensive project leveraging state-of-the-art deep learning techniques to accurately detect melanoma skin cancer, empowered by CNNs and advanced image processing.

title: AI-Powered Legal ChatBot
description: An AI-powered chatbot for retrieving and summarizing legal information from Indian litigation & corporate law documents. Built with advanced RAG techniques and efficient document processing.

title: AI-Powered Profile Enrichment
description: An AI system using GPT-4 to automatically enhance professional profiles by filling in missing details like job titles, education, skills, and descriptions in a structured JSON format.

title: Heart Disease Prediction
description: A comparative analysis project using ten different machine learning models to predict heart disease likelihood, focusing on model performance and accuracy evaluation.

title: Cinesent: Review2Rating
description: A machine learning project that transforms movie reviews into ratings using IMDB data, comparing SNN, CNN, and LSTM models for sentiment analysis accuracy.

title: Exploratory Data Analysis On Sales
description: A comprehensive data analysis project that uncovers patterns, trends, and insights in sales data, providing strategic business intelligence through advanced analytics.

title: Tesla Stock Prediction
description: A machine learning project that predicts Tesla stock prices using historical data and various features, providing actionable insights for investment decisions.

title: Weather Forecasting
description: A comprehensive weather forecasting system that predicts temperature using multiple algorithms like linear regression, random forest regression, and decision tree regression, considering various environmental factors.

title: NextJS E-Commerce AdminHub
description: A powerful admin interface built with Next.js that enables effortless management of e-commerce websites. Features intuitive controls for product management, content editing, and seamless frontend-backend integration.
